title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil spaghetti until al dente, then drain.
Fry bacon until crispy and set aside.
Whisk eggs and cheese together in a bowl.
Toss hot pasta with egg mixture to form a creamy sauce.
Mix in bacon and season with pepper. Serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a buttery tomato sauce.
instructions: Marinate chicken with spices and grill until cooked.
Heat butter and tomato puree in a pan.
Add grilled chicken and simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in cream and cook for another 5 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or naan.
